title: My friend Youngna is a wonderful writer and observer and I loved...
content:
My friend Youngna is a wonderful writer and observer and I loved these vignettes about ‚Äúhow kids understand power, social dynamics, hierarchy, control, and influence, all topics that swirl around whose voices are dominant voices in our world‚Äù.
